November 24, 2020

Matplotlib Cheat Sheet

Scatter

draw scatter points

plt.scatter(X_1[:,0],X_1[:,1],marker='o',color='red') #axes1,axes2,marker,color
plt.scatter(X_2[:,0],X_2[:,1],marker='s',color='blue')
plt.show()

Line

Draw a line through two points

plt.xlim(-5,11),plt.ylim(-5,11) #set range of line
plt.axline((x1,y1),(x2,y2))
plt.show()

November 24, 2020

Linear Discriminant Analysis

Linear Discriminant Analysis

PCA vs LDA

  • both for dimensionality reduction
  • LDA is supervised, PCA is unsupervised
  • LDA interested in the axes that maximize the seperation between multiple classes.
November 23, 2020

Principal Component Analysis

Principal Component Analysis

import numpy as np
  1. calculate mean values of each feature/column
  2. subtracting the mean column value for each column
  3. calculate covariance matrix of the centered matrix C
  4. calculate list of engenvalues and eigenvectors
  5. select k eigenvectors/principal components
